Package mastodon.util

Interface Summary
Variate<T> interface for a continuous variate.
 

Class Summary
ComparableDouble This class is unfortunate but necessary to conform to JDK 1.1
DiscreteStatistics simple discrete statistics (mean, variance, cumulative probability, quantiles etc.)
HeapSort sorts numbers and comparable objects by treating contents of array as a binary tree.
Regression simple regression of two variables
Variate.D A double precision concrete implementation of Variate
Variate.I A single precision concrete implementation of Variate
Variate.N<Number>  
 

Enum Summary
OSType
